body: I thought the question wasn't a choice between "fix the main repo now (with breaking changes)" or "use a separate package forever". I thought it was between "make breaking changes twice, with Go 1.5 and Go 1.6" or "make breaking changes only once, in Go 1.6, and in the meantime, supply a separate, temporary package for those who want it (but wind it down once Go 1.6 is out)".
